item.title: Christopher Asher WRAY
item.description: Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For the sake of transparency, open letters to Mr. Wray will be published on Christopher-Asher-Wray.com.

item.title: Pascal LE LUONG
item.description: Pascal LE LUONG is related to Chantal ARENS.

item.title: Frédéric PÉCHENARD
item.description: Frédéric Péchenard, former head of the French National Police and best friend of Éric Andrieu.

item.title: Éric ANDRIEU
item.description: Éric Andrieu, best friend of Frédéric Péchenard. An independent investigation should determine whether Éric Andrieu could be affiliated to Thomas Andrieu. Most likely not.

item.title: Emmanuel MACRON
item.description: Emmanuel Macron President of France Small introduction on Emmanuel Macron and his involvement. It’s related to Jean-Michel HAYAT There is a dedicated website, Macron-Emmanuel.com, on which are published open letters addressed to the French President.

item.title: Eric Andrieu, lawyer, Péchenard & Associés
item.description:
Translation coming soon.

Le 27 octobre 2015, je reçois un email de l’avocat de McDonald’s France Éric Andrieu du cabinet Péchenard & Associés.

L’avocat commet une faute exceptionnellement grave en confirmant “à [ses] clients que l’opération [note: en réalité une escroquerie] était conforme aux règles des droits français et européen.” C’est bien évidemment faux. Soit il est incompétent, soit il est complice.

item.title: Malcolm Hicks, Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe, sends me an email
item.description: On October 23, 2015, I receive an email from Malcolm Hicks who is the Corporate Vice President of McDonald’s Europe.

item.title: Françoise de Borda, former general counsel of McDonald's France
item.description:
Translation coming soon.

Françoise de Borda, directrice juridique de McDonald’s France, me réponds pour la première et pour la dernière fois. Elle ment.
